reviewText: the dvd quality is bad, the picture doesn't move and the instruction is not for beginner.  it is for black belt level which is not good for beginner to learn

Great video for any martial art's enthusiast. If you are really into Judo or want to get a foundation this is a great video for just that. The footage is " old school" the way it was and the way they trained back then. You will see moves and things that no local dojo around you would ever do. I was inspired by this ancient art and to see it done the way the Japanese Masters intended it to be used says everything -

Kodokan Masters shows good basic Judo and history of the Art.
 A good tape for beginners and black belts.  The only drawback was the length at 47min. for [price].
